Class FedoraAdminSecurityContext

    public class FedoraAdminSecurityContext
extends Object
implements org.modeshape.jcr.security.AuthorizationProvider, org.modeshape.jcr.security.SecurityContext
    This is a pass-through security context for authenticated Fedora administrators.
